name: Technology 2
overview: In the year 2105AD man, for so long held captive in our own solar system, is at long last free. Finally able to travel at speeds beyond warp, new frontiers have become available. You are one of the first to venture forth... As you journey through space, you will visit many of the planets, stars and sights which you have seen in the night sky. you will be given help on your voyage and if you follow the right path, riches will surely come. You will have as an assistant a very powerful computer whose name is A.R.T.H.U.R.. It isn't good at navigation but is very good as a companion and teacher and really good in the leisure department. But it will not just be work, you have important tasks to perform. Arthur will help you solve the puzzles that lie in store for you. Only when you have completed your task can you hope to qualify as a pilot for the Federation Cartel. Game developed by Paul Robertshaw and music by John Biggin.
